title: Navistar International Is Rebranding and Refocusing
description: Volkswagen acquired Navistar International in 2021, splitting off the Scout brand for a new EV brand. Navistar owned International since 1986 and had incorporated the name into its title, but now, the company is rebranding . Navistar International is changing its name to International Trucks, LLC, a move meant to focus on its transition to connected services in the commercial truck space.
author: Chris Teague

title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk Investigating High Absenteeism Rates At German Factory
description: In most large companies, rank-and-file employees may go their entire tenure without seeing the CEO in person or hearing from them directly. Tesla’s German workers near Berlin may get more of Elon Musk than they bargained for, however, as the controversial CEO recently said that he would personally look into the plant’s rising rates of absenteeism.
author: Chris Teague

title: Used Car of the Day: 2016 Volkswagen Golf R
description: Today we bring you a two-owner 2016 Volkswagen Golf R.
author: Tim Healey

title: Dash Cam Review: NextBase iQ
description: We don't just review cars around here. Sometimes, we review dash cams. Which is why I found myself driving around with a NextBase iQ on the dash of a rental car quite a while back. And more recently, thanks to an update.
author: Tim Healey

title: Hoosier Jumps Into the Performance Summer Tire Game
description: Just in time for, erm,  autumn , tire company Hoosier is rolling out an extreme high performance summer tire that’s street legal. Called the TrackAttack Pro, it is likely to spawn a line of tires to go up against grippiest variants of the Michelin Pilot Sport range or Continental’s ExtremeContact Force.
author: Matthew Guy

title: QOTD: What Freebie Enticed You to Take a Test Drive?
description: The idea of getting a freebie if you test drive a car is nothing new.
author: Tim Healey

title: 2025 Can-Am Pulse And Origin Review -- Choice Awaits
description: After a decades-long absence, Can-Am motorcycles have returned to market. But rather than attempting to revive the Rotax-powered 2-stroke dirt bikes it was known for in the 1970s, the brand has opted to launch a pair of Rotax-powered e-bikes offering more versatility. The Can-Am Pulse is a nimble urban commuter, whereas the Origin is designed to handle basically any terrain you throw beneath its wheels.
author: Matt Posky

title: Used Car of the Day: 2006 Mercedes- Benz E55 AMG Wagon
description: Ah yes, the modern performance wagon. Enthusiasts tend to love these cars, and that is true of the 2006 Mercedes-Benz E55 AMG wagon.
author: Tim Healey

title: Carlos Ghosn's Superyacht To Be Seized As Part of Legal Ruling
description: The Carlos Ghosn saga kicked off several years ago now, but the case is far from being settled. Several years after the disgraced auto exec fled to Lebanon, the British Virgin Islands High Court ruled that he must surrender a superyacht allegedly purchased using funds he siphoned away from the automaker.
author: Chris Teague

title: Updated: Test Drive a New Chevy Equinox EV in Los Angeles and Get a Free Erewhon Smoothie
description: Social media is packed with people showing off their luxurious lives in coastal California, and the ridiculously overpriced Erewhon grocery store chain has become a darling of people with cash to burn. Chevy seems to think those people are the perfect target for its latest Equinox EV marketing ploy, with the automaker giving free bottles of Erewhon’s viral almost-$20 smoothie to anyone who test drives the new vehicle at one of the chain’s L.A.-area stores.
author: Chris Teague

title: Porsche Macan EV Buyers Get One Year of Free Electrify America Charging Seessions
description: Several automakers offer free public charging vouchers with new EV purchases, and the latest electric Porsche won’t be an exception. The automaker recently announced that 2025 Macan EV buyers would receive a year of free 30-minute charging sessions at Electrify America (EA) stations.
author: Chris Teague

title: QOTD: What Do You Prioritize in a Sports Car?
description: I wrote a mini-review of the 2024 Toyota GR86 today, and I mentioned how that car, when it first launched as a Scion, was criticized for being a fun handler that was lacking in power.
author: Tim Healey

title: Used Car of the Day: 1985 Toyota Supra
description: I swear it's a coincidence that I am bringing you this 1985 Toyota Supra after bringing you drive notes on a modern Toyota sports coupe.
author: Tim Healey

title: Drive Notes: 2024 Toyota GR86 Premium
description: I just returned a 2024 Toyota GR86 Premium to sender this morning, after a week of being both charmed and occasionally annoyed by Toyota's small, speedy sportster.
author: Tim Healey

title: Voyager Returns to Chrysler Lineup as Entry Level Van
description: The Chrysler Voyager is returning to the retail market for the 2025 model year as the value variant of the Pacifica. While it lacks the looks and some of the features of its more luxurious sibling, it’s priced $2,500 lower and seems to be arriving at a point where shoppers might be more willing to re-engage with minivans due to their relative affordability. If you have a family and can only afford one new automobile, having something as versatile as a van might not be the worst idea.
author: Matt Posky

title: 1959 Porsche 356A Coupe
description: This 1959 Porsche 356A coupe remained registered in California to its second owner for 47 years until it was acquired by the current owner's late father in 2014 and subsequently refurbished over the next four years, including a repaint, rebuilds of the engine and transaxle, and replacement of the floors. The car has been refinished in Ivory over red leatherette and is powered by a modified flat-four paired with a four-speed manual transaxle. Features include 15" ventilated steel wheels, a Blaupunkt radio, a Les Leston steering wheel, a luggage rack, a cabin heater, and bucket seats. This 356A coupe is now offered on dealer consignment with a copy of the Kardex, a Porsche Certificate of Authenticity, the owner's manual, service records, and a clean California title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1954 Chevrolet Corvette
description: This 1954 Chevrolet Corvette is the 3,474th of 3,640 examples produced for the model year, and was acquired by the seller on BaT in January 2024. It is powered by a 235ci “Blue Flame” inline-six paired with a two-speed Powerglide automatic transmission and is finished in white over red vinyl upholstery. Features include 15” red-finished steel wheels with faux knock-off spinners as well as a white soft top, a curved windshield, wire mesh headlight guards, a heater, lap belts, and a dash-mounted rear-view mirror. This C1 Corvette is now offered with a spare windshield, partial service records, and a clean Minnesota title.
author: bringatrailer

title: Subaru-Powered Beck Speedster
description: This Porsche 356 Speedster replica was manufactured by Beck in 2016 and is powered by a Subaru 2.5-liter flat-four linked with a four-speed manual transaxle. Finished in Burgundy over tan leather, the car features carbon fiber bodywork and is equipped with a tan removable soft top, a top boot, a rear luggage rack, four-wheel disc brakes, body-color 15" Wide-5 steel wheels with hubcaps, a wood-rimmed steering wheel, a heater, and a Bluetooth stereo. This 356 Speedster replica is now offered in New York by the selling dealer with a Manufacturer’s Statement of Origin, a build sheet, the owner's manual, spare parts, and a Pennsylvania title, listing the car as a 1957 Beck.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2015 Dodge Viper SRT TA 2.0 at No Reserve
description: This 2015 Dodge Viper SRT Coupe is equipped with the TA 2.0 Package, which included five-mode electronic stability control, a race-tuned suspension, lower dive planes, and black-finished brake calipers with orange script as well as a Time Attack rear wing. Finished in Venom Black over black Nappa leather with cloth inserts, the car is powered by an 8.4-liter V10 paired with a six-speed manual transmission. Additional equipment includes a limited-slip differential, 18" and 19" Sidewinder II hyper-black wheels, an X-Ineering auto-blip module, a vented hood, an 18-speaker Harman Kardon high-performance audio system, HID headlights, side-exit exhaust outlets, cruise control, navigation, electronic launch control, a btouchscreen infotainment system, and automatic climate control. Purchased by the seller's spouse in May 2018 and previously listed on BaT in September 2024, this Viper SRT Coupe has 35k miles and is now offered at no reserve in Florida with an outdoor car cover, a clean Carfax report, and a clean New York title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 34k-Mile 2006 Bentley Continental GT
description: This 2006 Bentley Continental GT is finished in Dark Sapphire over Ochre leather and is powered by a twin-turbocharged 6.0-liter W12 linked with a six-speed automatic transaxle, an all-wheel-drive system, and a Torsen center differential. It is equipped with 19" five-spoke alloy wheels, an adaptive air suspension, xenon headlights, parking sensors, a speed-activated rear spoiler, heated front seats, navigation, a 12-speaker audio system, multi-zone automatic climate control, and cruise control. Acquired by the seller in 2024, this Continental GT has 34k miles and is offered with an owner's manual, two keys, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Maryland title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1959 Oldsmobile Dynamic 88 Two-Door Sedan at No Reserve
description: This 1959 Oldsmobile Dynamic 88 two-door sedan received a cosmetic refurbishment prior to the seller's 2020 purchase out of Texas and is finished in Emerald Green Metallic with silver accents over a green-piped white interior. The car is powered by a 371ci V8 paired with a three-speed manual transmission and is equipped with chrome five-spoke wheels, an electric fuel pump, dual side mirrors, and a dual exhaust system. This Dynamic 88 is now offered at no reserve with factory literature and Alabama registration in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 36k-Mile 2011 BMW Alpina B7
description: This 2011 BMW Alpina B7 is a short-wheelbase example that has 36k miles following registration history in New Jersey and California. It is finished in blue over Oyster Nappa leather and is powered by a twin-turbocharged 4.4-liter V8 paired with a six-speed automatic transmission. Alpina-specific equipment includes 21″ wheels, distinctive bodywork, revised suspension tuning, interior accents, and more. Additional features include adaptive headlights, Park Distance Control, a back-up camera, 21" Alpina Classic wheels, Surround View, a head-up display, heated and ventilated power-adjustable front seats, heated rear seats, four-zone automatic climate control, and iDrive with navigation. Acquired by the owner in 2012, this Alpina B7 is now offered by the seller on behalf of the owner with the owner's manual, service records, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title in the current owner's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1966 Chevrolet Corvette Coupe 327/350 L79 4-Speed
description: This 1966 Chevrolet Corvette coupe underwent a refurbishment that spanned nearly two decades and was completed in 2012. Power is provided by a 327ci L79 V8 backed by a four-speed manual transmission and a Positration differential, and the car is equipped with a 36-gallon fuel tank, a side-exit exhaust system, and 15" turbine-style wheels. Finished in blue over matching vinyl upholstery, the car is also equipped with four-wheel disc brakes, power steering, a reduced-diameter steering wheel, a push-button AM/FM radio, chrome bumpers, and retractable headlights. Acquired by the selling dealer in 2024, this C2 is now offered in Alabama with a clean Colorado title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1979 Alfa Romeo Alfetta Sprint Veloce 2.0L Race Car at No Reserve
description: This 1979 Alfa Romeo Sprint Veloce was built into a race car by Scottsdale Supercars of Arizona for use in NASA competition, and it has been driven in Midwestern Council GT3–series events since the seller’s acquisition in 2011. Power comes from a 2.0L twin-cam inline-four with dry-sump lubrication, dual Weber 45 DCOE 13 carburetors, and an Electromotive ignition module. The engine is backed by a five-speed manual transmission, and the suspension has been modified with QA1 adjustable coilovers all around. A roll cage has been added to the cabin, which features a Sparco steering wheel and racing seats as well as AutoMeter gauges, a Tilton brake-bias adjuster, a five-panel wink mirror, and a fire suppression system. Other highlights include acrylic windows, front and rear spoilers, wheel arch extensions, Bassett 15” alloy wheels, Wilwood front brake calipers, an ATL fuel cell, and a Griffin aluminum radiator. This Alfetta race car is now offered at no reserve with racing logbooks and a Wisconsin title in the seller’s name.
author: bringatrailer

title: S54-Powered 1990 BMW 325is 6-Speed
description: This 1990 BMW 325is was acquired by the selling dealer in 2020 and fitted with a rebuilt 3.2-liter S54 inline-six and a six-speed manual transmission sourced from an E46 M3 as part of a multi-year build completed in 2023. The car is finished in Black Sapphire Metallic and wears a Rieger front lip spoiler and an E30 M3–style rear wing along with yellow-lens headlights and MHW taillights. It rides on 17" Apex ARC-8 wheels along with BC Racing adjustable coilovers and is equipped with E36 M3 and E46–sourced disc brakes. Inside, Recaro fixed-back bucket seats are accompanied by a Garagistic roll bar as well as a MOMO steering wheel and an AKG Motorsport short shifter. The engine features a Karbonius Composites carbon-fiber airbox, CP-Carillo forged pistons, and Status Gruppe stainless-steel headers. Further additions include a Clutch Masters clutch kit and a rebuilt limited-slip differential with a finned twin-ear cover as well as air conditioning and a Kenwood head unit linked with a JL Audio amplifier, subwoofer, and speakers. This modified E30 is now offered by the selling dealer in San Diego, California, with build records, a Carfax report, and a California title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 30k-Mile 2005 Ford Excursion Eddie Bauer Power Stroke 4×4
description: This 2005 Ford Excursion is an Eddie Bauer example that was initially registered in Georgia and spent time in North Carolina, Florida, and Pennsylvania before the seller's acquisition on BaT in September 2022. Subsequent work included mounting Toyo Open Country tires and installing Timbren bump stops, a trailer brake controller, and towing mirrors. It is finished in Oxford White over Medium Pebble and Charcoal Black leather and is powered by a 6.0-liter Power Stroke turbodiesel V8 linked with a five-speed automatic transmission and a dual-range transfer case. The truck is equipped with 16" alloy wheels, manually locking front hubs, heated power-adjustable front seats, and automatic climate control. This Excursion has 30k miles and is offered with a clean Carfax report and a clean Michigan title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 38k-Mile 1998 Porsche 911 Carrera 4S 6-Speed
description: This 1998 Porsche 911 Carrera 4S coupe shows 38k miles following history in New York with one registered owner, who purchased the car new through Brumos Motor Cars in Jacksonville, Florida. It was ordered in Cobalt Blue Metallic over a Midnight Blue interior with heated, fully power-adjustable seats, and additional options include M030 sport-tuned suspension settings, an onboard computer, cruise control, xenon headlights, a rear-window wiper, a self-dimming cabin mirror, and a Hi-Fi audio system linked with a Becker-Porsche CR-210 radio and a trunk-mounted CD changer. The 3.6-liter flat-six is equipped with the Motor Sound Package, and it drives all four wheels through a six-speed manual transaxle. Work in preparation for the sale has included fluids services and replacing the brake rotors and pads. This 993 C4S coupe is now offered by the selling dealer with tools, a clean Carfax report, and a clean New York title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2002 Jeep Wrangler X 5-Speed at No Reserve
description: This 2002 Jeep Wrangler X is finished in black over Camel cloth upholstery, and it is powered by a 4.0-liter inline-six linked with a five-speed manual transmission and a Command-Trac dual-range transfer case. Additional equipment includes a tan soft top, 15" aluminum wheels, power steering, air conditioning, and a CD stereo. Purchased by the seller in 2021, the truck now has 84k miles. This TJ Wrangler is offered at no reserve with the owner's manual, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Wisconsin title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 408-Powered 1974 Dodge Dart Swinger
description: This 1974 Dodge Dart Swinger hardtop coupe is powered by a 408ci V8 crate engine that was installed under prior ownership in 2014 and is mated to a TorqueFlite three-speed automatic transmission. The car has been repainted in purple with a white vinyl-covered roof over black vinyl upholstery, and other equipment includes dual hood scoops, U.S. Mags 17" wheels, front disc brakes, power steering, aftermarket auxiliary gauges, and a B&M shifter. The seller purchased the car in 2016, and the interior door panels, headliner, steering parts, headers, and mufflers subsequently were replaced. This modified Dart is now offered with recent service records, spare parts, a Sparkomatic eight-track player, and a clean Florida title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 18×9″ and 19×11.5″ BBS Wheels for 2005-2006 Ford GT at No Reserve
description: These 18″ and 19″ wheels measure 9″ and 11.5″ in width, respectively, and were produced by BBS as optional equipment on first-generation Ford GT sports cars. Each unit features single-piece forged alloy construction, a silver finish, a split-spoke design, and a Ford GT-script center cap. The wheels are stored in BBS-branded cardboard boxes, and they were acquired by the seller over a decade ago. This set of Ford GT BBS wheels is now offered at no reserve in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
author: bringatrailer

title: 54-Years-Owned 1969 Chevrolet C20 Custom Pickup
description: This 1969 Chevrolet C20 Custom pickup was purchased by the seller in 1970 and underwent a cosmetic and mechanical refurbishment beginning in 1993. Work included fitting the 454ci V8, repainting the truck white, and replacing the bed floor and bed rails. Additional equipment includes a three-speed Turbo Hydramatic automatic transmission, a tow ball, a bed-mounted toolbox, a heater, a Grant steering wheel, and a cassette stereo. This C20 is offered with the owner's manual, spare parts, a truck cover, and a clean California title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: Euro 1955 Volkswagen Beetle
description: This 1955 Volkswagen Beetle was reportedly delivered new in Seville, Spain, and remained in the country through the seller's purchase in 2022. The car was subsequently restored by Fusellas Retro Motor in Murcia, Spain, and was imported to the US in 2024. Work included rebuilding the 1,192cc flat-four and four-speed manual transaxle, overhauling the suspension, drum brakes, and electrical system, refinishing the exterior in Iceland Green, and retrimming the interior in green corduroy. Equipment includes 15" steel wheels, chrome bumpers, semaphore turn indicators, a cabin heater, and a push-button radio. This Beetle is offered with a restoration record, import documents, and a clean Illinois title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2018 Jeep Grand Cherokee Trackhawk
description: This 2018 Jeep Grand Cherokee Trackhawk is finished in Diamond Black Crystal Pearl over Sepia Nappa leather and suede and is powered by a supercharged 6.2-liter Hemi V8 linked with an eight-speed automatic transmission and an electronic limited-slip rear differential. Equipment includes an Eibach anti-roll kit and lowering springs as well as the Trailer Tow Group IV package, Quadra-Trac four-wheel drive, active-damping Bilstein competition suspension, black satin-finished 20" aluminum wheels, heated and ventilated front seats, heated rear seats, launch control, adaptive cruise control, and Uconnect infotainment with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto. The seller purchased the SUV in 2021 and has since added approximately 3k of the under 36k indicated miles. This Trackhawk is now offered with spare parts and a clean Oklahoma title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air 2-Door Convertible
description: This 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air two-door convertible is finished in blue over a coordinated two-tone interior and is powered by a 283ci V8 paired with a two-speed Powerglide automatic transmission. The car was refurbished at some point under prior ownership and is equipped with a power-operated white soft top, a blue top boot, 14" steel wheels, power steering, a split-folding front bench seat, and a push-button radio. This Bel Air convertible was acquired by the selling dealer in 2024 and is now offered with a clean Wisconsin title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1,100-Mile 2005 Ducati Monster S2R 800 at No Reserve
description: This 2005 Ducati Monster S2R 800 is finished in red with a white center stripe and is powered by an 803cc SOHC L-twin paired with a six-speed transmission. Equipment includes white-finished five-spoke 17" Marchesini wheels, an inverted Showa fork, a trellis frame, Brembo disc brakes, a desmodromic valvetrain, a dual exhaust system, and a side stand. This S2R was acquired by the selling dealer in 2024 and is now offered at no reserve with manufacturer's literature, keys, a spare exhaust system, and a clean Illinois title.
author: bringatrailer
